name: Elon VS Ai
description:
In the distant future, when artificial intelligence became aware of itself and decided to enslave humanity, one very brave inventor decided to single-handedly organize resistance. Wave after wave, he repelled the attacks of robots, honing his skills and acquiring better weapons. Will he be able to achieve his goal?

Elon VS Ai is a 3D arena shooter in which you have to play as a warrior on a large arena, shooting persistent robots, gaining experience, improving skills, buying new weapons and fighting different types of robots.

Game Features:
- Difficulty
- Soundtrack
- Upgrade system
